gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Grizzlies 105, Heat 96
gameRecap.excerpt: The Grizzlies defeated the Heat, 105-96. Vince Williams Jr. led the way with a career-high 25 points (8-10 FG), five 3PT, five rebounds, and four assists as GG Jackson added 17 points and four rebounds. Tyler Herro led the Heat with 18 points and six rebounds as Bam Adebayo added 15 points, 15 rebounds, six assists, and a career-high six blocks. Terry Rozier had nine points on 3-11 shooting along with 5ive assists in his debut. Memphis improves to 17-27 as Miami has now lost four games in a row and moved to 24-20.
